panels.name: Incoming Requests by Source And Response Code

advancedQueries.query: 100*(sum(irate(istio_requests_total:sysdig{reporter="destination", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", response_code!~"5.*"}[$__interval])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace) / sum(irate(istio_requests_total:sysdig{reporter="destination", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls"}[$__interval])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace))

100*(sum(irate(istio_requests_total:sysdig{reporter="destination", connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls", response_code!~"5.*"}[$__interval])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace) / sum(irate(istio_requests_total:sysdig{reporter="destination", connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls"}[$__interval])) by (source_workload, source_workload_namespace))
